Detailed Description

ObitUVImager class function definitions.

This class is derived from the Obit base class.

ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Create/initialize ObitUVImager structures.

The output ImageMosaic member is created

Parameters:

uvdata ObitUV object with info member containng the output image specifications and all processing parameters.
err Obit error stack object.
Returns:
the new object.

ObitUVImager* ObitUVImagerFromInfo (  gchar *  prefix,
ObitInfoList *  inList,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Create UVImager object from description in an ObitInfoList.

Initializes class if needed on first call. Also works for derived classes.

Parameters:
prefix If NonNull, string to be added to beginning of inList entry name "xxx" in the following
inList InfoList to extract object information from
  • "xxxClassType" string UVImager type, "Base" for base class
  • "xxxUVData" prefix for uvdata member, entry with value "None" => doesn't exist
  • "xxxUVWork" prefix for uvwork member, entry with value "None" => doesn't exist
  • "xxxMosaic" prefix for mosaic member, entry with value "None" => doesn't exist
  • various weighting parameters
err ObitErr for reporting errors.
Returns:
the new object.

gconstpointer ObitUVImagerGetClass (  void   ) 
 

Public: ClassInfo pointer.

Returns:
pointer to the class structure.

void ObitUVImagerGetInfo (  ObitUVImager *  in,
gchar *  prefix,
ObitInfoList *  outList,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Extract information about underlying structures to ObitInfoList.

Parameters:
in Object of interest.
prefix If NonNull, string to be added to beginning of outList entry name "xxx" in the following
outList InfoList to write entries into
  • "xxxClassType" string UVImager type, "Base" for base class
  • "xxxUVData" prefix for uvdata member, entry with value "None" => doesn't exist
  • "xxxUVWork" prefix for uvwork member, entry with value "None" => doesn't exist
  • "xxxMosaic" prefix for mosaic member, entry with value "None" => doesn't exist
  • various weighting parameters
err ObitErr for reporting errors.

void ObitUVImagerImage (  ObitUVImager *  in,
olong  field,
gboolean  doWeight,
gboolean  doBeam,
gboolean  doFlatten,
ObitErr *  err
) 
 

Public: Form Image.

Parameters:
in The input object
field Which field (1-rel) to Image, 0=> all
doWeight If TRUE do Weighting ov uv data first If TRUE then input data is modified.
doBeam If True calculate dirst beams first
doFlatten If TRUE, flatten images when done
err Obit error stack object.

Parent classes portions are (recursively) initialized first
